snippet.title: Rare Revealed: A Rare Look at Twelve Tales: Conker 64
snippet.description:
Our favourite off-the-rails squirrel was on his best behaviour back in the days of Twelve Tales: Conker 64. The drastic transformation into Conker's Bad Fur Day came about long before Twelve Tales was complete as a game in its own right, but to this day we come across people eager for a better look at Conker's origins. So why not? We've got a stash of unseen footage, we've got Louise from the Conker team, and we've got a tale to tell...

To continue the story into the full Making Of Conker's Bad Fur Day, grab Rare Replay for Xbox One and find it in the Rare Revealed bonus features!

Get Rare Replay for more: https://store.xbox.com/Xbox-One/Bundle/Rare-Replay/bc5c9721-2752-489e-851a-aa2aa039a23c
Talk to us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RareLtd
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RareLtd
